locale.name: en_US
locale.message: This plugin appends a link to the management pages of the jornal management. Clicking on this link will display the contents of the journal public folder. This way journal manager will be able to manage the files and folders in the journal public folder. Address is http://[site_url]/public/journals/[journals_id]/[subfolder]/[file_name].

Allows manage public journal folder. This way journal manager will be able to manage the files and folders in the journal public folder. Address is http://[site_url]/public/journals/[journals_id]/[subfolder]/[file_name].
